column5: Experience the best of Arlington when you book this delightful 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom vacation rental house that comfortably sleeps 10. Known as the “Lone Star House of Quilts, Built around 1915 ,” this unique, historical home is just 1.5 miles from the AT&T and Texas Rangers Stadium, promising a memorable retreat! Excellent location - Just 1.5 miles from the AT&T Stadium and the Texas Rangers Stadium, 1 miles from the University of Texas at Arlington, and 5 miles to Six Flags!
column8: Historical Home 3 Miles Away to AT&T Stadium
